project.name: skyfall
project.component:
<ToolbarAndroid
            style={styles.toolbar}
            title="Test title"
            navIcon={require("../assets/images/robot-dev.png")}
            actions={[{ title: 'Search', show: 'always' }]}
            onActionSelected={this.onActionSelected} />
<Button onPress={onPressLearnMore} title="Learn More" color="#841584" accessibilityLabel="Learn more about this purple button" />
<FlatList data={[{ key: 'This is item 1' }, { key: 'This is item 2' }]} renderItem={({ item }) =><Text>{item.key}</Text>} />
